page.title: 17EDUCATION
page.content: {PRIMARY SCHOOLS There are two primary schools in Rosewell,a Roman Catholic and a Protestant. 34 children attend the Roman Catholic school which was originally a chapel. The school has 2 full time teachers, 6 visiting specialist teachers and 1 part time teacher. When the children are old enough ie 12 they have to travel to Dalkeith to attend St .Davids High School. 70 children attend Rosewell Primary. 4 teachers and 1 head teacher work there. There is a nursery school run by 2 teachers. 20 children attend.
